summary: The implementation covers most requirements including document viewer (REQ-3, REQ-7), folder management (REQ-4), file format support (REQ-6), and branding (REQ-1, REQ-2). However, drag-and-drop functionality (REQ-5) appears missing from the diff, and some acceptance criteria for REQ-3 and REQ-5 lack clear evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement drag-and-drop functionality to move folders and files within the technical folder structure
missing_requirements.reason: No drag-and-drop implementation found in the diff. TechnicalFileRow.tsx and TechnicalFolderPage.tsx show move functionality via dialogs/buttons (MoveFolderDialog, FolderInput button), but no draggable/droppable attributes, drag event handlers, or visual drop feedback as specified in acceptance criteria.

missing_requirements.requirement: Pinch-to-zoom works on touch devices (acceptance criteria)
missing_requirements.reason: DocumentViewer.tsx includes handleTouchStart/Move/End functions and getDistance helper for pinch detection, but the implementation is only applied to images. PDFs and other formats use iframe/embed which may not support the custom pinch-to-zoom implementation. Partial coverage.
